body_html:
Tony,
Another info to you: we are preparing another PR to migrate to the latest MKL-DNN (v0.14).
The new DNN improves concat op performance
1. old DNN concat only had jit implementation when concat dim is 'C" (that is, "Channel" dimension)
2. new DNN concat has jit implementation for any concat dim
So hopefully you can see performance improvement once that PR is in.
-GZ

body:
Tony,
Another info to you: we are preparing another PR to migrate to the latest MKL-DNN (v0.14).
The new DNN improves concat op performance
     1. old DNN concat only had jit implementation when concat dim is 'C" (that is, "Channel" dimension)
     2. new DNN concat has jit implementation for any concat dim
So hopefully you can see performance improvement once that PR is in.
-GZ
